name: TREKOLOGY Small Camping Table - Beach Table That Fold Up - Lightweight, Foldable, Potable Folding Small Outdoor Table - for Camp, Hiking, Campers & Summer Outing Trip
short_description: TAKE YOUR OUTDOOR EXPERIENCE TO THE NEXT LEVEL: The TALU camping tables that fold up lightweight provides the perfect solution for all your outdoor needs. It is a lightweight, durable, and foldable camping table that can withstand the toughest outdoor conditions.

It folds into the included carry bag and can be stored in your backpack, or wherever you need it. The small camping table provides a stable work surface for hobbyists. This portable camping table is a perfect companion with portable camping chairs or folding stools. You can even use it as a folding beach table, or a tent table while sitting on beach mats or camping mats.

BUILT TO LAST: This TALU camping folding table, camping side table is built with an aerospace-grade aluminum alloy that is waterproof, weather-resistant, and easy to clean. Its edge-hinged design provides sturdy construction that can support heavy tasks like cutting and cooking. It is the perfect companion for camping, beach, picnic, BBQ, backpacking, and any outdoor activities.

EASY TO SET UP, NO TOOLS REQUIRED: The aluminum base frame of this aluminum camp table is designed to pop up and fold with ease, without the need for any tools!. Its hinge design enables easy and robust connection to the table top.

STURDY AND SAFE: The portable table for camping is built to withstand weights of up to 50 lbs (23kg) and features anti-slip rubber feet that make it stable on a variety of terrains. With its strong joint and connector and unique anti-slip leg caps design, this small folding table, foldable beach table is super stable and safe to use.
